Hellplague:
 
"Perhaps.  We could elease a high energy gas, that would be confused for an exhaust gas.  Then we could go down there with no one able to spot us on their sensors," Hellplague says, a little excited.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

"Exist a way to block enemies' scanners... as ours?"asked the femme

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice/ Hellplague: 
>  
> "No, not the moon.  I can't survive for long there.  We'll have to 
sneak down to the planet, somewhere hy won't think to look," Malice 
said, looking down.
>  
> "Then to the planet it is,"  Hellplague said with a sigh.
> 
>
